objective_part1_desc: Prove your skills in the simulations under the 'Play' menu (`Skill+Dodge`, `CHAOS`, etc.). Every score you earn will turn into 'Echoes of Legends,' preparing you for the arena's ultimate trial.
objective_part2_desc:
Once you've gathered enough echoes, the locked gate on the main menu will open. Waiting for you there is The Paradox, the unrivaled master of the arena. When you face it, you have two paths:
   - Become a legend by defeating it as fast as possible.
   - Become a survivor by enduring against it for as long as possible.

story_title: The Legend of Shattered Reflections - Paradox
story_text:
The creators of the arena were looking for an answer, not a weapon. To find the answer to the question, ‚ÄúWhat is the perfect warrior?‚Äù, they planted a program called the ‚ÄúMirror Engine‚Äù into the heart of a digital universe. This engine had a single purpose: to observe, learn from, and become the perfect reflection of every warrior who entered the arena. 

But the Mirror did not see a single warrior. It saw thousands. 

Over the centuries, legends came and went from every generation. The Mirror Engine watched them all. It copied the flawless parry of a sword master, the ghostly steps of an assassin, the unpredictable rage of a chaos mage... everything. A perfect defense clashed with an unstoppable attack within its own logic. A patient strategy clashed with chaotic rage. The code, striving to contain thousands of different ‚Äúperfections‚Äù at once, began to crack under its own weight. 

And one day, the mirror shattered. 

Through the broken reflections, something entirely different now looked back. It was no longer a copy. It was a mosaic of every victory and every defeat the arena had witnessed. A part of every warrior's strongest moment, yet also an echo of each one's greatest fear.

It had become Paradox.

It no longer learns. It no longer evolves. For there is nothing left to learn. It is a completed work. It waits silently and unchallenged at the heart of the arena. It feels no hatred. It feels nothing. It simply exists‚Äîthe arena's ultimate, unanswerable question.

Facing it is not like fighting a single opponent. Facing it is fighting against the accumulated weight of all the legends that came before you.

Most are crushed under this weight, their skills drained, their names forgotten.
Those who cannot defeat it are remembered only by name.

But those who survive‚Ä¶ Carve their own names into the annals of legend.
